summary: A header file for the Server Side Include (SSI) Filter Extension Module for Apache. It defines structures, macros, and function prototypes for handling SSI directives, including error handling mechanisms through bucket brigades.

logs.reason: Creates a bucket containing an error message from the context's error_str field and appends it to the bucket brigade. Used when SSI processing encounters an error.
logs.resolution: Specific resolution depends on the actual error message. Check SSI syntax in the requested documents and server configuration related to SSI processing.
